divs: Sighting DetailsI was going outside with my camera walking towards our big treehouse.When I got to the top and I looked up,the object was really close to the treehouse. I didn't know what the object was when I first saw it. The object was just moving slowly across the sky. When I saw it I was really frightened so I just climbed down the ladder to get away. I turned arond to look at the object and saw it disapeared.
trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Albany
There were no other sightings in Albany on or around September 24th 2006
Summary: I saw a disk shaped object in the sky black in the middle and orange on the bottom and top.
